about_the_game:
Lawless Lands

A mighty runemaster has come down from the frozen mountains of Stothlheim to lend his assistance to Crossia.

Do you have a mighty foe who has become your worst nemesis? Do you wish your character was stronger, faster, or more resistant? Do you have piles of gold and nothing to spend it on? Do you wish that your magic was less fizzle and more dazzle? The runemaster can help!

For the right price, he can craft runes for you and your companions (even pets) that will bestow their magical powers on the user.

Runemaster DLC:
  • New Magic Vendor - The Runemaster (Sells runes, scrolls, tomes, and potions - located in the North Outskirts of Pyrshen)
  • New Learnable Skill - Clarity (Gives additional spirit regeneration - perfect for spellcasters - free for everyone who owns the base game as part of the Runemaster update)
  • Sigil Staff - An incredibly powerful staff that holds the secrets of all of the ultimate spells from each school of magic combined
  • Sigil Wand - The smaller counterpart to the Sigil Staff, this wand holds all of the basic spells of each magic school
  • Runes of Agility (Increase Prowess on any character or companion)
  • Runes of Strength (Increase Power on any character or companion)
  • Runes of Endurance (Increase Physique on any character or companion)
  • Runes of Constitution (Increase Posture on any character or companion)
  • New Unique Title "Runeforged"
  • 1 Glyph of Ascension added to your strongbox (Used on your personal character to increase 1 aspect of your choice)
  • 2 Tomes added to your strongbox (Used on any character or companion to increase experience by 100 points)

*This DLC makes creating magic-based characters such as mages much easier to do, but is also great for other types of characters as well.

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST FIRST TALK TO HUSTAN IN THE PYRSHEN HOSPITAL TO ACTIVATE THE DLC! THEN, YOU CAN SPEAK TO THE RUNEMASTER IN THE NORTHERN PYRSHEN OUTSKIRTS. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!

short_description: The Runemaster DLC for Lawless Lands adds magical runestones and a fabled staff and wand to make your characters and companions even more powerful than ever before! With this comes a new title, new skill, a new magic shop in the Capital City of Pyrshen, and some extras to help on your adventures!
